synopsis.text: Since birth, Nasa Yuzaki has been on a mission to live up to his unique name by leaving a lasting impact on the world. However, his life takes an unexpected turn when he encounters a captivating girl named Tsukasa, who saves him from a near-fatal accident and agrees to date him on one condition: they must first get married. Despite knowing little about her, Nasa wholeheartedly agrees and embarks on a journey to find his mysterious bride-to-be. After years of searching, Tsukasa finally appears at his doorstep, and the two begin their unconventional married life together. As they navigate the ups and downs of their new relationship, Nasa discovers that Tsukasa may not be entirely human and possesses strange powers. Will Nasa's love for Tsukasa be enough to uncover her secrets and solidify their bond, or will her mysterious past prove too much for their marriage to handle? Join Nasa and Tsukasa on their heartwarming and otherworldly adventure in this romantic comedy.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
